reg_pit.acttitle: South Coast British Columbia Transportation Authority Act
reg_pit.title: First Investment Plan Regulation

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 271/2016, effective January 1, 2019.

reg:regulation.reg:acttitle: South Coast British Columbia Transportation Authority Act
reg:regulation.reg:title: First Investment Plan Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Prescribed period for first investment plan
bcl:section.bcl:text: The prescribed period for the purposes of section 202.1 (1) (b) of the South Coast British Columbia Transportation Authority Act starts on November 1, 2016 and ends on September 1, 2017.
This regulation is repealed on January 5, 2019.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: South Coast British Columbia Transportation Authority Act, S.B.C. 1998, c. 30, section 202.1]
